price: 10. Waxaa barako iyo khayr badan Alle ee hadduu doono ku siin wax ka khayr badan taasi - jannooyin (beero) ay hoostoodu webiyo qul-qulaan, wuxuuna ku siin daaro waaweyn (Jannada gudaheeda).
arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِيٓ إِن شَآءَ جَعَلَ لَكَ خَيۡرٗا مِّن ذَٰلِكَ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكَ قُصُورَۢا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī in shāa jaʿala laka khayran min dhālika jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru wayajʿal laka quṣūran
